articles.author: Matt Drake
articles.title: Nasal spray 'that can stop you catching Covid for up to two days' could be available by the summer - Daily Mail
articles.description: A nasal spray that could prevent a Covid-19 infection for two days could be available to buy over the counter within months. Researchers believe it could help lift Covid restrictions.
articles.content:
Researchers have developed a nasal spray which could prevent a Covid-19 infection for up to two days and it may be available in pharmacies within a few months.
